txt.en: You should find and defeat the Wyrm-father
You found the passage from the Wyrmdelf out onto Fang Tor.
You found the passage from the Wyrmdelf out onto Fang Tor.\n\nYou should confront and defeat the Wyrm-father
'Long has the Wyrm-father plagued our herds. It is a joy to know that he is no more!\n\n'You have the gratitude of the people of Eaworth.'
The Wyrm-father perches upon Fang Tor, outside the Wyrmdelf.\n\nYou should defeat the great drake known as the Wyrm-father.
There are Rohirrim at Eaworth, south-west of the Wyrmdelf.\n\nYou should return to Eaworth and tell someone of the Wyrm-father's defeat.
Bring the Wyrm-father's scale to the Rohirrim at Eaworth
